A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I first watched this movie I hated it. But looking back I can appreciate it for what the movie did and brought into the Star Wars universe.  Even though it is a bit messy\, the movie has an important message to tell and exhibits great character growth. Rian Johnson has amazing directing and story-telling skills\, and while he may say what you don't want to hear\, it is what you need to know. This movie is akin to the Empire Strikes Back\, which is why it is my second favorite Star Wars movie of all time.
